comment: Lemma for ~ lcmfdvds and ~ lcmfunsn . These two theorems must be proven simultaneously by induction on the cardinality of a finite set ` Y ` , because they depend on each other. This can be seen by the two parts ~ lcmfunsnlem1 and ~ lcmfunsnlem2 of the induction step, each of them using both induction hypotheses. (Contributed by AV, 26-Aug-2020.)
